name: Sam Steele and the Rangers of the Galaxy
name_original: Sam Steele and the Rangers of the Galaxy
description:
The evil Count Arcturis has stolen a black hole generating device and it's up to you to get it back! Journey across the galaxy doing battle with his henchmen until you come face to face with the madman himself! This is a straight up third person shooter which takes it's inspiration from old timey TV serials of the 1950s. 

Game Features

  • Third Person Action
  • Six Level Story-Based Campaign
  • Cutscenes
  • Optional Big Head Mode
